a: Elementary and middle‑school students in partner school districts. We offer Pre‑Coding (K‑2), Beginner Coding (3‑5), and AI/Entrepreneurship (6‑8).
If your school isn’t listed yet, contact us to bring Tech Tykes to your campus.
For Grades 3–8, students should bring a charged laptop unless your school provides one.
Up to 2 weeks before the start of class: 6% cancellation fee.
Up to 1 week before class begins: 20% cancellation fee.
Foundational problem‑solving, algorithmic thinking, and collaboration.
Depending on the program: Scratch, project building, presentations, and age‑appropriate introductions to AI concepts.
On‑campus after school at participating schools across the Bay Area. Locations vary by session.
